participant_1.background:
I just finished building my new gaming computer.
I love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training.
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
i am a female and love to be surrounded by males.
my left knee is filled with metal.

participant_2.background:
I don't have a car, but I do have a great reading nook in my house.
I love playing with my pets when I'm not working.
my family means the world to me.
I loved spending summers in the mountains, where the weather was always cool and refreshing.
i like to play sports and get fresh air.

content.text: Not much, just enjoying my day off.
Nice! Me too. I just finished building my new gaming computer.
That's awesome! Do you play any games in particular?
Yeah, I play a lot of different games. I'm really into RPGs and strategy games.
I love strategy games too! I'm a big fan of the Civilization series.
Me too! I've been playing Civilization VI since it came out.
That's awesome! What's your favorite civilization to play?
I like to play as the Romans. They're a really powerful civilization with a lot of cool bonuses.
I like the Romans too! They're a great choice for beginners.
Yeah, they're definitely a good option for beginners.
What other games do you like to play?
I also like to play games like Stardew Valley and Minecraft.
I love Stardew Valley! It's such a relaxing game.
Yeah, it is! I love the farming and the relationships you build with the villagers.
Me too! I'm always trying to get the best crops and the best relationships with the villagers.
